contest-event.event-date:
April 27, 2019 D European Championships
European Championships 10 Set Test and Own Choice European Championships european-championships
Dear Cassandra
Music and Convention Centre (Auditorium Stravinski), Montreux, VD, Switzerland Originally planned to take place in Palanga, Lithuania, but moved to Montreux in late 2017 due to the hall acoustic not being ready in time.
Set Work, Friday 26th April, adjudicators: Bousfield, Grélat, Van Thienen; Own Choice, Saturday 27th April, adjudicators: Van der Roost, Rüedi, Van der Velde.
Best Soloist: Glenn Van Looy (Euphonium) - Valaisia Brass Band Set Work placing takes precedence in event of a tie
New Piece - World Premiere: Explorers on the Moon (Paul Raphael)
Oct. 14, 2017, 7:25 p.m. Dec. 4, 2019, 1:47 p.m.
1 Cory Band Philip Harper Explorers on the Moon
2 Paris Brass Band Florent Didier Music of the Spheres
3 Eikanger-Bjørsvik Musikklag Ingar Bergby Concerto Grosso [Bourgeois]
4 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Michael Bach King Kong on Rue Igor Stravinski
5 Brass Band Willebroek Frans Violet Concerto [Szentpali]
6 Valaisia Brass Band Arsène Duc Glass
7 3ba-brass Luc Vertommen The 39th Parallel
8 Brass Band Oberösterreich Ian Porthouse From Ancient Times
9 Brighouse and Rastrick Band David King A Brussels Requiem
10 Provinciale Brass Band Groningen Richard Visser Old Licks Bluesed Up
11 Göta Brass Band Michael Thomsen The 39th Parallel
12 Concord Brass Band Jesper Juul Windahl Vita Aeterna Variations (Variations & Fugue on an Original Theme)
13 Italian Brass Band Filippo Cangiamila Extreme Make-over
